operation.name: insertUser
operation.sql: insert into test_user (name, age, password) values(?,?,?)
operation.sqlmap: insert into test_user (name, age, password) values(#{name}, #{age}, #{password})

operation.name: selectCountByAge
operation.description: 根据年龄查询用户个数
operation.sql: select count(*) from test_user where age between ? and ?
operation.sqlmap: select count(*) from test_user where age between #{minAge} and #{maxAge}

operation.name: updateUser
operation.sql: update test_user set age = ?, password=? where name = ?
operation.sqlmap: update test_user set age = #{age}, password=#{password} where name = #{name}
